# rivestack_cluster_backup_config (Resource)

Manages backup configuration for a Rivestack HA PostgreSQL cluster.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "rivestack_cluster_backup_config" "example" {
  cluster_id     = rivestack_cluster.example.id
  enabled        = true
  schedule       = "0 3 * * *"
  retention_full = 14
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cluster_id` (String) ID of the cluster.
- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether automated backups are enabled.

### Optional

- `retention_full` (Number) Number of days to retain full backups.
- `schedule` (String) Cron schedule for automated backups (e.g., "0 3 * * *" for daily at 3 AM).

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Resource identifier (cluster_id).
- `updated_at` (String) Last update timestamp.
